Welcome to KNNY's magical site


Hi, I'm KNNY, an artist and a somewhat front-end dev. My work mostly deals with topics around the self and enlightenment. My most recent series titled ‚ÄúLight Beings‚Äù features materialized consciousness as someone who is looking for the all-encompassing purpose of life while entering different dimensions of reality. I mix this light being philosophy with 3D buildings and code - it's hard to describe what I do unless you see it.
